review_data.title: Good food and friendly staff
review_data.content: We ate dinner at Schlauch. The waiter was extremely friendly and helpful. The food was good and it tasted like home made. I highly recommend this place :) !

review_data.title: Best place for snooker
review_data.content: An institution! The classic place in Zurich for pool, billard and especially snooker - nice atmosphere, filled with aficionados of the game - maje sure you have a reservation!

review_data.title: Delicious, healthy, great value

review_data.title: Slightly too somber
review_data.content: Excellent positioned in the Niederdorf, Schlauch could be an oasis to escape the turmoil of the tiny medieval streets of Zurich old town. However, we found it a little bit too sober tending to discouraging. Food was average, not expensive but not particularly tasteful either....More

review_data.title: Great find
review_data.content: We enjoyed everything about our dinner. Friendly staff, great menu with veggie and vegan options, local and organic, nice atmosphere (we ate out back), and very reasonable prices especially compared to other restaurants in the area.
